examples.example: 生活中总会遇到各种各样的事情，但我们要保持乐观积极的态度去面对。

translate.english: There will always be all kinds of things in life, but we should keep an optimistic and positive attitude to face them.

examples.example: 生活中有很多美好的事情值得我们去期待和努力追求。

translate.english: There are many wonderful things in life worthy of our anticipation and hard pursuit.

examples.example: 每天都有许多有趣的事情等待着我们去发现和体验。

translate.english: Every day there are many interesting things waiting for us to discover and experience.
